gallery.mainTitle: Relive Every Story in Your Life
gallery.mainSubtitle: From graduations and weddings to family portraits, capture your precious moments with an experienced team.

Wisuda.label: Graduation
Wisuda.title: Congratulations, you finally graduated!
Wisuda.text: Your graduation is proof of all the hard work you have put in over the past few years. Celebrate with your family, friends, and loved ones. Yogzan will help capture every moment of your graduation day so you can remember it forever.

Pernikahan.label: Wedding
Pernikahan.title: From Promises to a Lasting Story
Pernikahan.text: A wedding day is a sacred moment that unites two hearts and two families. From the emotional glances to the joyful laughter, Yogzan is ready to capture every detail with warmth and meaning. Let your love story be beautifully preserved for a lifetime.

Wedding | Pre-Wedding.label: Wedding | Pre-Wedding
Wedding | Pre-Wedding.title: From Promises to a Lasting Story
Wedding | Pre-Wedding.text: A wedding day is a sacred moment that unites two hearts and two families. From the emotional glances to the joyful laughter, Yogzan is ready to capture every detail with warmth and meaning. Let your love story be beautifully preserved for a lifetime.

Keluarga.label: Family
Keluarga.title: Every love begins with family
Keluarga.text: Capture every joyful family occasion, from expecting a little one and celebrating birthdays to holiday getaways and family portraits.
